node.title: Second man charged with murder over Mt Roskill homicide
node.description: Police could not rule out further arrests being made over the incident.
node.content: ["Police have arrested and charged a second man with murder over the shooting of Brian James in the Auckland suburb of Mt Roskill.", "James, 23, was fatally shot and two others hospitalised when the attackers targeted the Glass Rd property in the central suburb of Mt Roskill on December 23.", "On Wednesday the investigation team found a 42-year-old man at a south Auckland address.", "The man was wanted for charges of murder and wounding with intent to cause grievous bodily harm in connection to the incident. Police said he was taken into custody without incident.", "Shortly after his arrest, police also arrested another south Auckland man, aged 39, for being accessory after the fact to murder.\u00a0", "He was also charged with unlawful possession of a firearm after police allegedly located a loaded sawn-off shotgun. Both men will appear in Auckland District Court on Thursday.", "The first person to be charged with murder - a 33-year-old man - was arrested in Napier on January 13.", "Detective Inspector Scott Beard said even though the investigation team had made multiple arrests, police cannot rule out further arrests or additional charges being laid.", "He said James' family, along with the two victims of the machete attack at the Glass Road address, are relieved and grateful at this latest development and the fact the alleged offenders are being held accountable.", "\"As the matter is now before the courts, police are unable to comment further,\" a police spokesperson said.\u00a0"]
